column2: in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.

column1: accessibility.statement.technical.p2=*This service is partially compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard
column2: due to the non-compliances listed below.

column1: accessibility.statement.technical.heading2=*Non-accessible content
accessibility.statement.technical.p3=*The content listed below is non-accessible for the following reasons.
accessibility.statement.technical.heading3=*Non-compliance with the accessibility regulations
accessibility.statement.technical.p4=*Some of the links in the service are not descriptive. This doesn’t meet WCAG 2.1 success criterion 2.4.4 (Link Purpose in context).
accessibility.statement.technical.p5=*The autocomplete functions on some pages in this service may cause issues for people using a screen reader. This doesn’t meet WCAG success criterion 4.1.2 (Name
column2: Role

column1: accessibility.statement.technical.p6=*Some of the pages in the service have a redundant fieldset
column2: which could prevent users browsing out of context from understanding what is being selected. This doesn’t meet WCAG success criterion 1.3.1 (Info and Relationships) and 4.1.1 (Parsing).

column1: accessibility.statement.technical.p7=*The ‘Have you applied for money laundering supervision with HMRC?’ page does not have a fieldset and legend attribute

column1: accessibility.statement.technical.p9=*The error link in the ’Client details‘ page does not link to the error. This doesn‘t meet WCAG success criterion 2.4.1 (Bypass Blocks).

accessibility.statement.technical.p10=*The error validation message in the ‘What type of business are you?’ page is not descriptive. This doesn’t meet WCAG 2.1 success criterion 3.3.3 (Error Suggestion).
accessibility.statement.technical.p11=*We have carried out an in-house expert review of the service and fixed these accessibility issues.
accessibility.statement.technical.p12=*We will arrange a further formal external audit of the full service as soon as possible
